hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Install dependencies sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y gcc bison flex cmake perl libtool openssl libaio-dev git-core wget tar vim coreutils plotutils libc6 libssl-dev sqlite3 libmysqlclient20 libmysqlclient-dev pandoc librabbitmq-dev valgrind libsqlite3-dev libsqlite3-0 tcl tcl-dev libuuid-perl libgnutls-openssl27 libgnutls28-dev libgcrypt11-dev libdmalloc-dev libdmalloc5 libjemalloc-dev uuid uuid-dev libeditline-dev doxygen libedit-dev libpam0g-dev libpam-modules
export WORK_DIR=`pwd` cd $WORK_DIR
#Clone source git clone https://github.com/mariadb-corporation/MaxScale.git cd MaxScale git checkout maxscale-2.2.1 export CFLAGS=-fsigned-char
#Make changes to source sed -i "421i \ \t\ \ /*swap memory for auth token length to read it in big endian order on bigendian platforms*/" ./server/modules/authenticator/MySQLAuth/mysql_auth.c sed -i "422i \ \t\ \ #if defined(__BIG_ENDIAN) && __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN" ./server/modules/authenticator/MySQLAuth/mysql_auth.c sed -i "423i \ \t\ \ client_data->auth_token_len = le32toh(client_data->auth_token_len);" ./server/modules/authenticator/MySQLAuth/mysql_auth.c sed -i "424i \ \t\ \ #endif" ./server/modules/authenticator/MySQLAuth/mysql_auth.c
sed -i '1054,1055 s/40/BINLOG_FNAMELEN + 1/' server/modules/routing/binlogrouter/blr_slave.c sed -i '1072d' server/modules/routing/binlogrouter/blr_slave.c sed -i '1071 a\snprintf(file, sizeof(file), "%s", router->binlog_name);' server/modules/routing/binlogrouter/blr_slave.c sed -i '1075d' server/modules/routing/binlogrouter/blr_slave.c sed -i '1074 a\snprintf(position, sizeof(position), "%lu", router->binlog_position);' server/modules/routing/binlogrouter/blr_slave.c git diff
#Build and Install Maxscale cd $WORK_DIR/MaxScale/pcre2 ./configure --without-pcre2-jit cd .. mkdir build && cd build cmake -DBUILD_TESTS=Y .. make sudo make install
#Testing ctest
#Start Maxscale #sudo cp maxscale /usr/local/share/maxscale/ #sudo cp maxscale.conf /usr/local/share/maxscale/ #sudo ./postinst #sudo /usr/local/bin/maxscale --user=maxscale
#sleep 60s #ps -aef | grep /usr/local/bin/maxscale #pgrep -d" " -f "maxscale" | xargs sudo kill;
